original_text: They took the animals for the burnt offerings to give to the people. They shared them among each group of families. Then each family could offer a bull to the Lord as a sacrifice, in the way that the book of Moses taught.
korean_text: 그 번제물을 옮겨 족속의 서열대로 모든 백성에게 나누어 모세의 책에 기록된 대로 여호와께 드리게 하고 소도 그와 같이 하고

sentences.original_text: They took the animals for the burnt offerings
They shared them among each group of families
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그것들을 각 가족 그룹별로 나누어주었습니다

sentences.original_text: Then each family could offer a bull to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 각 가족은 주께 황소를 제물로 바칠 수 있었습니다

sentences.original_text: in the way that the book of Moses taught
